---
title: "Authentication Quick Start"
description: "Add login to your app in 5 minutes"
---

import { Steps, Tabs, TabItem, Aside } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

Add email, social, and wallet login to your app. Users can sign in without installing browser extensions or understanding cryptocurrency.

## What You Get

- **Email login** - Magic link, no passwords
- **Social login** - Google, Twitter, Discord, GitHub
- **Wallet login** - MetaMask, Coinbase (optional)
- **Automatic accounts** - Smart wallets created automatically
- **Session management** - Handled for you

## Installation

<Tabs>
  <TabItem label="npm">
    ```bash
    npm install @varity/ui-kit @varity/sdk
    ```
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="pnpm">
    ```bash
    pnpm add @varity/ui-kit @varity/sdk
    ```
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="yarn">
    ```bash
    yarn add @varity/ui-kit @varity/sdk
    ```
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

## Setup

<Steps>

1. **Wrap your app with PrivyStack**

   ```tsx title="app/layout.tsx"
   import { PrivyStack } from '@varity/ui-kit';

   export default function RootLayout({ children }) {
     return (
       <html>
         <body>
           {/*
             PrivyStack uses shared dev credentials by default.
             Add your own appId for production.
           */}
           <PrivyStack appId={process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_PRIVY_APP_ID}>
             {children}
           </PrivyStack>
         </body>
       </html>
     );
   }
   ```

2. **Add a login button**

   ```tsx title="components/Header.tsx"
   import { PrivyLoginButton, usePrivy } from '@varity/ui-kit';

   export function Header() {
     const { authenticated, logout } = usePrivy();

     return (
       <header>
         {authenticated ? (
           <button onClick={logout}>Sign Out</button>
         ) : (
           <PrivyLoginButton />
         )}
       </header>
     );
   }
   ```

3. **Protect routes**

   ```tsx title="app/dashboard/page.tsx"
   import { PrivyProtectedRoute } from '@varity/ui-kit';

   export default function DashboardPage() {
     return (
       <PrivyProtectedRoute>
         <Dashboard />
       </PrivyProtectedRoute>
     );
   }
   ```

</Steps>

That's it. Users can now sign in with email or social accounts.

## How It Works

1. **User clicks "Sign In"** - Opens modal with login options
2. **User authenticates** - Email code, Google, Twitter, etc.
3. **Account created** - Smart wallet generated automatically
4. **Session started** - User is logged in and ready

Users never see wallet addresses or transaction confirmations unless you choose to show them.

<Aside type="tip">
**No API keys needed for development.** PrivyStack uses shared development credentials automatically. Add your own keys before production.
</Aside>

## Access User Data

```tsx
import { usePrivy } from '@varity/ui-kit';

function Profile() {
  const { user, authenticated } = usePrivy();

  if (!authenticated) {
    return <p>Please sign in</p>;
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Email: {user?.email?.address}</p>
      <p>Wallet: {user?.wallet?.address}</p>
      <p>Auth method: {user?.linkedAccounts?.[0]?.type}</p>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## User Object

The `user` object contains:

| Property | Type | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| `id` | `string` | Unique user ID |
| `email` | `object` | Email address if provided |
| `wallet` | `object` | Auto-generated wallet |
| `linkedAccounts` | `array` | All linked accounts |
| `createdAt` | `Date` | Account creation date |
